Even in war... murder is murder.

During the Vietnam war, a girl is taken from her village by 
five American soldiers. Four of the soldiers rape her, but 
the fifth refuses. The young girl is killed. The fifth soldier 
is determined that justice will be done. The film is more 
about the realities of war, rather than this single event.
